title: "Loot" isn't working as intended
body:
Hello Everybody,

after the Patch there is an Error-Message upon opening the Loot-Tab for the first time. According to Riot's "!"-Message the Loot-Tab and it's Functions are working as intended. BUUUUT: I can't use any Event-Items. I cant use my 80 Worlds Tokens nor my Starguardian Tokens. Neither will the Key-Fragment-Combiner pop up. It seems i can only use Skin-/Champion-Shards and Mastery 6/7 Items to upgrade (basically everything that doesnt require a Pop-Up on the right side of the Loot-Tab :)

Now i can't see what Things are hidden in my Wolrds- Token :( Rito, PLS!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Edit: checked on my other Account for testing and it did'nt work as well.

replies.body: There is an issue where hextech loot is giving an unintended error.  Loot is still working without issue, though.  We've updated our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page with this incorrect messaging, keep an eye out for updates.

Why do i get the feeling that you did NOT read my Post and just put in an Autotext fitting for my Title?

As i wrote down: I cant use Any Items in my Loot that require something to Pop up on the right side of the Loot-Tab... I don't think this is working as intended... 

FeelsBadMan

Sorry for the confusion here, it turns out I'm having trouble understanding your specific issue but there's no autotext on the boards.  If you're still unable to use hextech crafting despite the current messaging, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'd like to take a closer look to see if there's something more going on, and will reply back as soon as we can.
Ah OK :) I will submit a Ticket then :) Thank you and have a nice day :)
